title: Lured
description:
He's madness and I'm tired of being sane.
I watched him. Studied him. Became obsessed with him. Doctor Dominic is a social anomaly. A monster in plain sight. A sociopath. Beneath the expensive clothes and well-crafted facade lurks a predator whoâ€™s searching for his next prey. I got caught. Now he wants one thing. Me.Lured is a romantic suspense with mature content. Read at your own discretion.
author: Rina Kent
